To reach the exit safely, I should first try to move towards the exit by navigating through the available spaces and avoiding enemies.

Since I need to move to the right towards the exit while maintaining the strategy of avoidance, I will move:

``` Action:2 ``` 

This action should take me right towards the exit. My expectation is to position myself closer to the exit while still avoiding the pursuer.
